typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{DEPT ID } as string,
		{EMP NAME} as string,
		LEVEL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> EmployeeFile
source(output(
		source_column as string,
		target_column as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ColNameRef
EmployeeFile keyGenerate(output({Emp SID} as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> EmpKey
EmpKey, ColNameRef lookup({DEPT ID } == source_column,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(source_column, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupColName
